title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description:
The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the field correctly based on the different content types. There are three types of content in the field:

1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
3) Text with RTF tags.

The bug is related to the dynamic text element not rendering the content correctly based on its content type.
OB: The dynamic text element does not correctly display the contents of the field that contain different content types. It fails to render HTML fragments not within <html> tags and text with RTF tags properly.
EB: The dynamic text element should correctly render all types of content within the field: HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Create a DB field with three types of content: 
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text does not correctly render the different types of content.
